title: Band of Susans Discography (1987-1995)
description:
Discography of noise rock/early Shoegaze group Band of Susans. Led by guitarist Robert Pross, the ensemble focused on sonic textures created by the interplay of three guitarist. Page Hamilton, of Helmet, played guitar on the groups second and best album Love Agenda. Counter to the implication that the group is chock-full of Susans, Hope Against Hope is their only album with three members named Susan. The CD release of Hope Against Hope features the Blessing and Curse EP as bonus tracks.


contains:
1988 - Hope Against Hope
1989 - Love Agenda
1991 - The Word and the Flesh
1992 - Now [EP]
1993 - Veil
1994 - The Peel Sessions [EP]
1995 - Here Comes Success
1995 - Wired for Sound [compilation]

v0 mp3
